reviews.review: good game. i like to speedrun this game a lot. now i'm going to get all badges.

Portal 2 has a really good story! The only problem I have with it is that it is long, so if you are like me and have a short attention span this game might not be for you, but if you are willing to put in the hours this game is totally worth it!
Words can't describe how great this game is.

The way portal uses its physics engine in order to incorporate beatifully rendered empty worlds that perfectly connect with you, and make you physically be immersed in the world of this genius physics game, it's genuinely inspiring, through taking such a simple idea and taking a large amount of time to build up on it, portal 2 is the perfect version of a puzzle game.

Portal 2 is even better than the first portal game.
Portal 2 has a lot of content and a very good story.
The story tells much about the history af apeture and answers some questions about it.
I would really recommend this game to anyone, who liked portal one and i would recommand both if you don't have played the yet.
